230672022.given_title: jashkenas: “This library takes the stance that logicless is a counter-produ
230672022.excerpt: At a conference I recently attended, two separate topics related to templates sparked a debate off-stage about Logic vs No-logic View Templates. Folks were very passionate about the side they represented.

372211809.excerpt: Human logic, unlike that of the machines which we program and use every day, isn't perfect. We make mistakes, we establish bad mental habits, and we have many cognitive biases that negatively impact our ability to be successful engineers.

377167753.excerpt: In which I open the hood of the Meteor framework and see what’s inside.  I recently started a new web project, and several friends suggested I check out Meteor, a new framework for building real-time webapps.

403692121.resolved_title: When Should You Hire a Junior Developer?
403692121.excerpt: Most companies prefer to hire experienced software developers — people who require little training in order to do their jobs. Particularly in startups, even hiring someone at a lower salary doesn’t make sense if that person can’t pull their weight.

416579673.resolved_title: Republican Congressman Miserably Fails At Minimum Wage Math
416579673.excerpt: By: Keith BrekhusAug. 13th, 2013more from Keith Brekhus  Apparently, Congressman Mullin has not heard of the California based chain In-N-Out burgers which start all their employees at ten dollars an hour or above. The burgers remain competitively priced despite the higher employee wages.

416647513.given_title: Famous Actor Reveals Real Name, Gives Incredibly Insightful Speech About ‘H
416647513.resolved_title: Famous Actor Reveals Real Name, Gives Incredibly Insightful Speech About ‘Hard Work’ and Generosity…at Teen Choice Awards
416647513.excerpt: It’s fairly safe to say that viewers don’t tune in to the Teen Choice Awards in hopes of hearing incredibly insightful advice about the importance of hard work, perseverance and dreaming big — but that’s exactly what they got from Ashton Kutcher this year.

1.caption: UNIVERSAL CITY, CA – AUGUST 11: Actor Ashton Kutcher speaks onstage at the Teen Choice Awards 2013 at the Gibson Amphitheatre on August 11, 2013 in Universal City, California. Credit: Getty Images

418081002.given_title: Startup Stud Hates Homeless People, Ugly Girls, and Public Transit
418081002.resolved_title: Startup Stud Hates Homeless People, Ugly Girls, and Public Transit
418081002.excerpt: It's not easy to innovate—no one ever said it'd be easy. You've got things like "reality" and "demand" stomping on your dreams for the next delivery laundry app. What makes it even worse is the hellish condition of cesspool San Francisco, as one startup founder laments. Let's offend everyone!
